name: calculate_column_statistics
description: Calculates statistical information (mean, standard deviation, maximum, minimum) for a numeric column in an Excel or CSV file.

file_path.description: The path to the Excel (.xlsx, .xls) or CSV (.csv) file.

sheet_name.description: The sheet name or index in the Excel file (ignored for CSV files).

column_name.description: The name of the column for which to calculate the statistical information.
